title: Booth's Rajan: Warsh Must Get Handle on Monetary Policy
description: Raghuram Rajan, University of Chicago Booth professor and former IMF Chief Economist, says Kevin Warsh must quickly establish credibility on monetary policy. Speaking with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on The Close, Rajan says Warsh needs to win the confidence of fellow FOMC members and maintain distance from the administration. (Source: Bloomberg)
